resources.string:
This game is designed for training purpose. 
Objectives: 
 - learn NavigationUI(menu, Up button, Drawer, Navigation Graph and slide animation) 
 - learn ViewModel architecture 
 - create ViewModel using ViewModelProvider 
 - implement Observer Pattern 
 - data binding between ViewModel and layout.xml 
 - data binding using binding adapter 
 - playback sound 
 - implement recycler view (Grid layout) 
 - implement DiffUtil 
 - add header and footer to recycler view
Try to complete 3 challenges to win the game. \n - Tap a dice to throw it. \n - Tap Menu/Shuffle to throw all dice.
